nodes.excerpt: Apart from Paperform's in-house experts, we reached out to the design community to gain insights into what makes a good form great 🎨What's inside: - Why forms matter - The psychology of forms - How to structure online forms - How to make your forms look beautiful

nodes.excerpt: Make boring meetings a thing of the past. Engage your audience and energize participants with live polls, quizzes, word clouds, Q&A's and new slide layouts. Creating an entire slide deck in Mentimeter has never been easier or more beautiful!

nodes.excerpt: GetMyInvoices is the central invoice management software for your company. The solution automatically retrieves invoices & other documents from thousands of sources – from portals over email postboxes and cloud storages to scanned documents. 14 Days FREE Trial
nodes.title: GetMyInvoices.com - Automatically retrieve invoices & docs from thousand sources
nodes.author: GetMyInvoices

localize.description: GetMyInvoices是贵公司的中央发票管理软件。该解决方案自动检索发票和其他文件从成千上万的来源 - 从门户网站的电子邮件邮箱和云存储到扫描文件。14天免费试用
localize.tagline: 从上千个来源自动检索发票和文件。

localize.description: GetMyInvoices是貴公司的中央發票管理軟件。該解決方案自動檢索發票和其他文件從成千上萬的來源 - 從門戶網站的電子郵件郵箱和雲存儲到掃描文件。14天免費試用
localize.tagline: 從上千個來源自動檢索發票和文件。

nodes.excerpt: Brainiac is a database of 150 cognitive biases, principles & models that influence customer's decision, let you create better products and help you increase your sales. Every single bias includes a sketch, description, possible applications and more
nodes.title: Brainiac - Database of 150 cognitive biases that control our decisions
nodes.author: Mike

localize.description: Brainiac是一个包含150个影响客户决策的认知偏差、原理和模型的数据库，让你创造更好的产品，帮助你提高销售额。每一个偏向都包括一个草图、描述、可能的应用等。
localize.tagline: 控制我们决策的150种认知偏差的数据库。

localize.description: Brainiac是一個包含150個影響客戶決策的認知偏差、原理和模型的數據庫，讓你創造更好的產品，幫助你提高銷售額。每一個偏向都包括一個草圖、描述、可能的應用等。
localize.tagline: 控制我們決策的150種認知偏差的數據庫。

nodes.excerpt: Static pages are so last year!💥 Drive user engagement, improve their experience and navigation by 21%, and increase your conversion rate with vector animation of empty states and UI icons. Get our free animations and customize them to your app design 🌈

nodes.excerpt: Figma Comments allows you to view and add new comments right from your phone. All you have to do is connect your Figma account and select the files you need. And as your teammates reply, you will see the new comments on the app, in real-time!

localize.description: Figma Comments允许你在手机上直接查看和添加新的评论。您所要做的就是连接您的 Figma 帐户并选择您需要的文件。当你的队友回复时，你将会在应用程序上看到新的评论，而且是实时的。

localize.description: 转售是人们买卖当天送货的市场。1.将一件家具列入转售清单2.要求优步司机在几分钟内将家具送货。3.付款会直接送到您的银行账户。
localize.tagline: 买入卖出，当天送货

localize.description: 轉售是人們買賣當天送貨的市場。1.將一件傢俱列入轉售清單2.要求優步司機在幾分鐘內將傢俱送貨。3.付款會直接送到您的銀行賬戶。
localize.tagline: 買入賣出，當天送貨
